response.original_title: Save the Crew: The Battle for Columbus
response.overview: The remarkable story of a fan base who showed the world that fan action trumps money. The Columbus Crew - a founding member of MLS - was under threat of relocation to Austin, Texas for the 2019 MLS season by their owner Anthony Precourt. Fans in Columbus rallied around the team with the grassroots #SaveTheCrew campaign. This film is the only on-camera account of events as they happened in both Columbus and Austin, capturing some of the most fascinating moments in Ohio sports history.
response.title: Save the Crew: The Battle for Columbus
